content: The product profile for the VITROS 4600 immunoassay system begins with stating the intended use of the system, which is the in vitro measurement of various clinical analytes including serum, plasma, urine, and cerebrospinal fluid. It then describes the components of the system, which include a clinical chemistry analyzer, display monitor, controls, reagents, and disposable instrumentation. The profile also highlights the features of the VITROS MicroSlide technology, which is designed to minimize operator interventions and increase ease of use. Another feature of the analyzer is the VITROS Intellicheck technology, which is intended to provide real-time process monitoring and reduce the risk of incorrect result reporting. The product profile is concise and informative, highlighting the key features and intended use of the VITROS 4600 immunoassay system.
